content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drilling entities found) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Examples of entities that need fuel include burner-mining-drill and burner-inserter.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that entities that require connections (like steam-engine) are properly connected before use.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that entities waiting for source items (like burner-inserter) have access to the required items.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that entities that require electric power (like electricity-group) are properly plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have the required items before attempting to use them.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned.
